rugged.translation[0].definitions[0].def: land that is rugged is rough and uneven
rugged.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the rugged beauty of the Highlands
rugged.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a man who is rugged is good-looking and has strong features which are often not perfect
rugged.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a vehicle or piece of equipment that is rugged is strongly built and not likely to break easily
rugged.translation[0].definitions[3].def: rugged behaviour is confident and determined but not always polite
